page.title: 03Clubs
page.content: Our block has not as many clubs as a town area would have. There is a group for very young children in EATON CONSTANTINE called the {TODDLERS GROUP.}This group meets every week and it is for babies to school age children. There is a{FRIENDSHIP CLUB}for people over fifty.The {FRIENDSHIP CLUB}is held in the Village Hall in EATON CONSTANTINE. A{YOUTH CLUB}meets in LEIGHTON it is for children from about ten to sixteen.{ { BROWNIES,CUBS }and {GUIDES}go to CRESSAGE once a week. The {WOMENS INSTITUTE}meets in Leighton Hall once a month.
